function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of adherence to preventive measures such as self-isolation and isolation of infected patients","Impact":"Increased spread of the novel coronavirus and other contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Enforcement of strict adherence to preventive measures, public education on the importance of isolation","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, remote monitoring technology for isolation","People":"General population, infected patients, individuals at risk of exposure","Owner":"Government health departments, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of hygiene measures and precautions during diagnosis and clinical care","Impact":"Increased risk of infection transmission to healthcare workers and patients","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict hygiene protocols, use of personal protective equipment (PPE)","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote diagnostics, PPE manufacturing technology","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, individuals seeking clinical care","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, medical institutions, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Failure to follow WHO recommendations for avoiding close contact with infected individuals and animals","Impact":"Increased risk of contracting contagious diseases such as acute respiratory infections","Mitigation":"Public awareness campaigns, enforcement of social distancing measures, animal control regulations","Technologies":"Social distancing monitoring technology, public health communication platforms","People":"General population, individuals in close contact with infected people or animals","Owner":"Government health departments, public health organizations"}]}
